resources.string: Foldable App Samples by Surface Duo
Welcome to Foldable Samples by Surface Duo!
Drag and drop - Shows how to build a layout where you can drag and drop content from other apps.
Dual View - Shows how to build a layout with custom behavior for single screen or dual screen.
Hinge Angle- Shows how to listen to the hinge angle sensor and use the angle values.
List Detail - Shows how to implement the list-details pattern on Surface Duo.
Pen Events - Shows how to follow the pen events and use the metrics.
Two Page - Shows how to build a two page layout.
Companion Pane - Shows how to build a companion pane.
Extended Canvas - Shows how to integrate a large canvas.
Intent To Second Screen - Shows how to open activities in different scenarios.
Qualifiers - Shows how to use the android resource qualifiers to structure the project resources for duo devices.
Multiple Instances - Shows how to open multiple instances of the same activity.
